pyzui.dialogwindows module¶

PyZui DialogWindows

class pyzui.dialogwindows.DialogWindows[source]¶

Bases: object

All the windows that require an user input rather than simple click, those are in MainWindow

_open_zoom_sensitivity_input_dialog()[source]¶
class _open_string_input_dialog[source]¶

Bases: object

gather the string trough a dialog and let select the color. also gives a selection column of the last 20 used colors.
